blogPost.title:
A Georgia senator bought and sold FireEye 61 times in 2016, making him a buy and hold investor at Robinhood. 

https://t.co/CLY9IQNiyp
blogPost.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
2016年，一名佐治亚州参议员买卖FireEye 61次，使他成为罗宾汉的买入并持有投资者。

https://t.co/CLY9IQNiyp

2016年，一名佐治亞州參議員買賣FireEye 61次，使他成爲羅賓漢的買入並持有投資者。

https://t.co/CLY9IQNiyp
